posts.post_content:

Mordecai Brown (Chicago on shirt) Piedmont PSA 1 $100
Frank Chance (Portrait Yellow) Sweet Cap SGC 1.5 $90
Tom Needham Piedmont SGC 2 $35
Ed Reulbach (No Glove) Sweet Cap SGC 2 $50
Joe Tinker (Bat Off Shoulder) Piedmont SGC 1.5 $110
Joe Tinker (Bat On Shoulder) Piedmont SGC 3 $205
Joe Tinker (Hands On Knees) Piedmont SGC 2 $115
Jake Pfeister (Seated) Polar Bear SGC 2.5 $45
Jake Pfeister (Throwing) Sweet Cap SGC 3 $40
Jimmy Sheckard (Glove Showing) Polar Bear SGC 2 $40
Pat Moran Piedmont 350 SGC 4 $55
Orval Overall (Portrait) Piedmont 150 SGC 3 $60
Heinie Zimmerman Old Mill SGC 3 $70

Thanks!
